DOC.brief_summary: This research examine whether 8-week online nutritional programming base Mediterranean diet achieve meaningful increase intake Mediterranean base diet improvement measure body weight laboratory measure oxidative stress , risk marker cardiovascular disease . This study also examine whether weekly short support communication medical assistant ( MA ) primary care set addition online program result well program adherence positive impact health .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Eight Week Online Mediterranean Based Diet
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant identify primary care provider staff clinical outpatient site ( ) . Study 3-arm randomize control trial participant randomize 1 ) Control group ( CTL ) -will receive access online program intervention first 12 week ; 2 ) GFFY-1-will receive access online program without MA intervention 3 ) GFFY-2-will receive access online program MA intervention weekly phone call . The core intervention 8-week Mediterranean diet behavioral online program call `` Go ! Foods You ( GFFY ) '' offer Cleveland Clinic 's 360.5.com website . The research last 24 week . Questionnaire data biometric measurement collect pre post intervention ( 0-8 week ) followup ( 12 24 week ) . Regardless randomization , participant ask provide weight every week activity log end week program . A urine sample measure F2-isoprostane collect week 0 12 GFFY-2 CTL group . A preparatory phase require involvement MAs provide weekly support participant necessary test process communication MAs . Enrollment 10-20 volunteer preparatory phase desire . Data collect phase part study analysis . To test data collection process , may ask participant complete baseline questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 great . Age 18 70 year old . Patient participate Internal Medicine Family Medicine primary care provider Cleveland Clinic Family Health Center . Registered Cleveland Clinic 's electric medical record , My Chart . Women pregnant planning pregnant next 6 month . No easy internet email access place residence . No access scale place residence weekly weight measurement . Sudden unintentional weight loss weight gain past 3 month due medical illness Currently involve weight loss program unwilling waitlist control group participant access program 3 month unwilling log onto internet regular basis duration study ( 34 month )
